props.name: closeDelay
props.description: The duration from when the mouse leaves the trigger or content until the hover card closes.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description: The open state of the hover card when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the hover card. Can be binded as `v-model:open`.

props.name: openDelay
props.description: The duration from when the mouse enters the trigger until the hover card opens.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the hover card changes.
